thread.title: SENSE Mag Taps Human Made ‘HMMD’ and Pharrell Williams for SS17 Editorial
thread.title_full: SENSE Mag Taps Human Made ‘HMMD’ and Pharrell Williams for SS17 Editorial

author: Kam Dhillon
title: SENSE Mag Taps Human Made ‘HMMD’ and Pharrell Williams for SS17 Editorial
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
Location: Tokyo, Japan
Season: Spring/Summer 2017
Key Looks: Electric tropic-print pants (slide #2,) patchwork denim and a tiger-printed camp shirt is a dreamy combo (slide #3) and the staple gray hoodie (slide #4.)
Editor’s Notes: Pharrell Williams has graced the cover of SENSE Magazine’s March issue. The Tokyo-based tome tapped the style icon to front an SS17 editorial dedicated to Human Made, the brand from BAPE co-founder NIGO who also shot in this editorial.
For more fashion news, have you seen this Supreme SS17 editorial preview shot by Terry Richardson ?
